銷.definition: to melt (metal); to cancel; to annul; to sell; to expend; to spend; pin; bolt; to fasten with a pin or bolt

銷假.definition: to report back after a period of absence

銷售.definition: to sell; to market; sales (representative, agreement etc)

銷售時點情報系統.pinyin: xiao1 shou4 shi2 dian3 qing2 bao4 xi4 tong3

銷售額.definition: sales figure; total income from sales; turnover

銷售點.definition: point of sale (POS); checkout; retail outlet

銷帳.definition: to write off; to cancel an account; to draw a line under

銷戶.definition: to close an account; to cancel sb's household registration

銷案.definition: to close a case; to bring a case to a close (law)

銷毀.definition: to destroy (by melting or burning); to obliterate

銷聲匿跡.definition: to vanish without trace (idiom); to lie low

銷號.definition: to close an account; to cancel a (phone) number

銷蝕.definition: to corrode; to erode; to wear away (lit. and fig.)

銷行.definition: to sell; to be on sale; to be sold

銷賬.definition: to write off; to cancel an item from accounts

銷路.definition: sale; market; state of the market; sales event

銷金窟.definition: money squandering establishment (e.g. gambling den, brothel etc)

銷魂.definition: ecstasy; rapture; to feel overwhelming joy or sorrow
